name: nodular basal cell carcinoma
definition: A basal cell carcinoma characterized by elevated, pearl shaped nodules with telengactisae on the surface and periphery. [url:https\://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3573444/]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a Phase I trial, Dz13 demonstrated safety, reduced tumor c-Jun expression, and showed some preliminary efficacy in patients with nodular basal cell carcinoma (PMID: 23660123).

references.title: Safety and tolerability of an intratumorally injected DNAzyme, Dz13, in patients with nodular basal-cell carcinoma: a phase 1 first-in-human trial (DISCOVER).
